description: A terminal-based Tetris game implemented in Python using the aiAgency framework.

classes.name: GameConfig
classes.description: Stores configuration settings for the Tetris game.

fields.name: tick_rate
fields.description: Game loop tick rate in seconds.

methods.name: load_from_file
methods.description: Loads configuration settings from a file.

modules.name: tetromino
modules.description: Represents Tetris pieces and their behaviors.

fields.name: shape
fields.description: Matrix representation of the tetromino shape.

fields.name: position
fields.description: Current position of the tetromino on the board.

methods.name: clear_lines
methods.description: Clears completed lines from the board.

modules.name: render
modules.description: Handles rendering of the game state.

classes.name: Renderer
classes.description: Renders the game board and tetrominos.

methods.name: render_board
methods.description: Renders the current state of the game board.

classes.name: InputHandler
classes.description: Processes user input for game control.

methods.name: get_input
methods.description: Gets user input for controlling the game.

classes.name: GameLoop
classes.description: Manages the game loop and state transitions.

fields.name: is_running
fields.description: Indicates if the game loop is running.

tests.name: test_tetromino_rotation
tests.description: Tests the rotation functionality of tetrominos.

tests.name: test_line_clearing
tests.description: Tests the line clearing functionality of the game board.
